segments.text: I am having some plumbing problems and need them fixed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What exactly is wrong with the plumbing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are there any problems with the plumbing in the kitchen ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Both the kitchen and the bathroom plumbing are messed up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long have you had these problems ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It has been going on for a while , but just started to get worse this morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will send someone out to take a look at the problem . Will you be home this afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I will be home this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine . I will be there around two . If someone is not there , I will use my key to get in .
segments.speaker: S2
